title: What Does Fishing for Rebar Have to Do with Building a More Sustainable Internet?
description: Danny Lewin Community Care Days (DLCCDs) are a celebration of our late co-founder Danny Lewin?s generous spirit and his tenacious appetites for collaboration, innovation, and (especially) giving back to our global community. DLCCDs bring to life our values and empower all Akamai employees to volunteer in the communities where we work, operate, and live.
author: Mike Mattera
